doc.title: The Fairway Gourmet
doc.plot: Hosted by world-renowned chef Jacky Pluton, The Fairway Gourmet is a new lifestyle program catering to those who are passionate about the finest pleasures of life - from golf and cuisine, to wine and travel. In each half-hour segment, Jacky travels to the world's most stunning and revered golf venues where he plays - on and off the course. After a day on the golf course, he then visits the finest resorts, restaurants and attractions of the region, tasting the local flavor and cuisine and sharing its special pleasures.
